document_data.caption: An empty equipment frame.
document_data.name: Equipment Frame
document_data.mainbody: '''Equipment frames''' were tools sometimes used by [[ranger]]s or woodsmen throughout [[Faer√ªn]].
document_data.Description: Equipment frames were made from [[steel]] and weighed {{SI|5|lb|k|long=yes}}. Hooks were strategically placed about the frame for hanging gear.
document_data.History:
These items were used to effectively store and carry gear, evenly distributing their collective weight on the wearer's hips instead of shoulders, allowing them to conserve energy.

Equipment frames were available for purchase through ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue (in-universe)|Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]'' for 10 [[gold piece]]s, and a weatherproof canvas fly could be had for an additional 3 [[silver piece]]s.
